author: Jan Christensen
content: Incredible, but so hopeful. They are such magnificent creatures. I’ve been on whale watches in New England, and now I’m looking for ones closer to home.

author: ws
content:
The Indian point nuclear power plant in Buchanan, NY, utilized Hudson River water for Rankine cycle condenser cooling.. the effect was to de-aerate the river water, & lower dissolved oxygen levels..

Now, Indian Point is closed, Higher dissolved oxygen levels are good for marine flora, and fauna..Alas, wooden pilings and piers are attacked by worms and gribbles..
